text.section: If the accident causing injury occurs in this Commonwealth every person suffering loss from injury arising out of maintenance or use of a motor vehicle has a right to basic reparation benefits, unless he has rejected the limitation upon his tort rights as provided in KRS 304.39-060(4).

law.history: Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 372, sec. 1, effective July 14, 2000. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 385, sec. 3, effective July 1, 1975.
